name: hapi-hydra
description: versioning for hapi, using all three methods: https://www.troyhunt.com/your-api-versioning-is-wrong-which-is/

scripts.test: lab -a @hapi/code -v -I WebAssembly,BigUint64Array,BigInt64Array,BigInt,URL,URLSearchParams -t 100 -m 30000 -r console -o coverage.log -r console -o stdout -r html -o coverage.html

author: daniel@bretoi.com
